text: Laura Leighton (July 24, 1968 in Iowa City, Iowa) is an American actress. She works mainly on television programs. She plays Ashley Marin in Pretty Little Liars. She also played Sydney Andrews in the primetime soap opera Melrose Place. Leighton has also appeared in other television shows. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Iowa City, Iowa
title: Laura Leighton
